Mobile Phones

This list contains 16122 Mobile Phones in India. This price list was last updated on Aug 11, 2023.

Top 3 Mobile Phones are as follows:
  1. Xiaomi Redmi 12 5G: 50 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 8 MP Front Camera, Memory Card (Hybrid), Wi-Fi, 128 GB inbuilt, Snapdragon 4 Gen2
  2. Xiaomi Redmi 12 5G (6 GB RAM + 128 GB): VoLTE, 6.79 inches, Memory Card (Hybrid), 4G, 90 Hz Display with Punch Hole
  3. Xiaomi Redmi 12 5G (8GB RAM + 256GB): IR Blaster, 6.79 inches, 2.2 GHz Processor, Octa Core, 50 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 8 MP Front Camera
